meanings.definition: indecentest: superlative form of indecent, lacking modesty or propriety
meanings.sent1: The outfit she wore to the party was the indecentest one I had ever seen.
meanings.sent2: That movie had some indecentest scenes that made me uncomfortable.
meanings.sent3: He tried to impress his crush by telling the indecentest jokes, but it only made her laugh.
meanings.sent4: The graffiti on the wall was the indecentest form of expression.
meanings.sent5: The indecentest behavior at the restaurant caused a scene and shocked everyone.

meanings.definition: indecentest: comparative form of indecent, not conforming with generally accepted standards of behavior or morality
meanings.sent1: This dress is indecentest than the one you wore yesterday.
meanings.sent2: The language used in the movie was indecentest compared to what we usually hear.
meanings.sent3: The indecentest behavior at the zoo involved a monkey stealing a visitor's hat.
meanings.sent4: The indecentest act of kindness came from a stranger on the street.
meanings.sent5: The indecentest joke at the party left everyone speechless.
